entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 06:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
